name: RamDriveSync
short_description:
If you are, for example, an artist who works with extremely large files (maybe 7,500MB+),
things can slow down a lot when you save and copy.

This slowdown can be dramatically alleviated with a RAM drive, which is a virtual hard
drive that resides in your computer's RAM (memory). This batch file solves a caveat of that
approach. .pdf documentation included (which gives an installation/usage overview of a free RAM drive and this batch).
summary: A batch to auto-backup a RAMdrive (to e.g. work with huge art files)
